medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began several hours prior to presentation. The patient denies fevers, nausea, vomiting, and diarrhea, and reports moving bowels regularly. Pain control improved slightly with morphine.
medical_history.past_medical_history: History of diabetes mellitus with retinopathy and neuropathy, hypertension, hyperlipidemia, gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), history of MRSA osteomyelitis/ulcer, and toe amputation.
medical_history.family_history: History of diabetes mellitus, heart disease, and biliary disease.
